types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# the exposure of cut bunches of [[grape]]s to the [[sun]] in order to increase the concentration of [[sugar]] prior to [[winemaking]]
types.html:
passerillage m (plural passerillages)

  1. the exposure of cut bunches of grapes to the sun in order to increase the concentration of sugar prior to winemaking
trans: the exposure of cut bunches of grapes to the sun in order to increase the concentration of sugar prior to winemaking
